short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow Dice Rolls From External Character Sheets in Roll20

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow dice rolls from a zero level character sheet to be rolled in roll20 from the website currently hosted at https://zero-level-character-generator-frontend.s3.amazonaws.com/.  The need for this is because neither roll20 nor DnD Beyond allow the creation of zero level characters, so this is to support players and GMs who are running funnel adventures in roll20.
